thread.title: Deer busts through glass door at Giant grocery store in Pa.
thread.title_full: Deer busts through glass door at Giant grocery store in Pa.

author: USA Today Network
title: Deer busts through glass door at Giant grocery store in Pa.
text:
CLOSE Skip in Skip x Embed
x Share
Oh, deer -- the mischievous mammal wreaked havoc at the Manchester Giant. Ted Czech 
Don Newman placed a wooden board at the entrance of Giant in Manchester where a deer ran through the glass on Monday night. (Photo: Ted Czech, York Daily Record) 
586 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE YORK, Pa. â€” Unfortunately for police, a mischievous deer that got inside a Pennsylvania grocery store was long gone before they could ask questions.
The deer busted through a glass entrance door of a Giant grocery store in Manchester on Monday night, and ran around inside before getting back out. Two other deer were spotted in the nearby parking lot, too.
The trio decided to flee the scene before police got there.
"They didn't hang around to be questioned," Northeastern Regional Police Chief Bryan Rizzo saud.
The deer were seen running through a parking lot where they had their pick of nearby stores: a donut shop, a liquor store and a grocery store.
USA TODAY
Warden rescues deer stuck in swimming pool
USA TODAY
Teen shoots deer that busted into house
One deer slammed into a window of Smoker's Outlet, but didn't cause any damage, Rizzo said.
Another deer was seen running off through a nearby field.
But the third ended up slamming into a glass door at Giant and briefly wreaked havoc inside, where some customers were shopping.
"It appeared dazed," Giant spokeswoman Samantha Krepps said, "but continued through the store."
Three customers helped calm the deer and took it outside near a field next to the store where it ran off. No one was hurt. There was only minor damage to the store, according to Krepps.
